measure module¶

This module is part of the nmeta suite running on top of Ryu SDN controller to provide network identity and flow metadata. It is provides methods to record events and retrieve data related to these measurements.

class measure.Measurement(_config)¶

Bases: object

This class is instantiated by nmeta.py and provides methods to record events and retrieve data related to these measurements.

get_event_metric_stats(event_type)¶

Return the event metric stats for specified event type as a dictionary

get_event_rate(event_type)¶

Return the event type rate per second for last x seconds

get_event_rates()¶

Return the event type rates for all rate event types

kick_the_metric_buckets(bucket_max_age)¶

Tidy-up by deleting old metric buckets.

kick_the_rate_buckets(bucket_max_age)¶

Tidy-up by deleting old rate buckets.

record_metric(event_type, event_value)¶

Store an event in a bucket in such a manner that avg/max/min can be retrieved

record_rate_event(event_type)¶

Record a rate event of a particular type occurred
